content.raw: I don't think `spnav_fd` will prevent the error message. The implementation of `spnav_fd` only returns `sock`, which is `-1` until `spnav_open` is called. I didn't see a method in the the spnav library that will test if "/var/run/spnav.sock" exists and the daemon is running without printing an error message.
content.html: I don't think spnav_fd will prevent the error message. The implementation of spnav_fd only returns sock, which is -1 until spnav_open is called. I didn't see a method in the the spnav library that will test if "/var/run/spnav.sock" exists and the daemon is running without printing an error message.
